TextSection.Contents: Facial dermoid cyst is a rare benign cutaneous neoplasm containing keratinized epithelium and dermal derivatives such as hair follicles sweat and sebaceous glands smooth muscle or fibroadipose tissue which usually manifests as a firm nonpulsatile mass often with a sinus opening or a hair-bearing punctum most commonly located in the periorbital and nasal area.

Parent.Label: Cysts and fistulae of the face and oral cavity
